data.message: Don't care and don't want to hear about san fansisco and their overly gay pop how did this get on my page!

replies.message: Facebook posted it.  You're on Facebook.
I don't want to see this kind of stuff so how do I block this crap!
Delete your Facebook account, it's the only way.  Don't worry, we won't miss you.
Screw you marc you dont see me being a dick! Just cuz I don't want to see how f'd up our country is becoming doesn't give you the right to be a douche! Same for Christopher!

get off facebook Ashley, that's how you stop seeing this

better yet, put on a blindfold when walking around, you might accidentally see a gay couple and be like "UGH!!!".
^Actually, you are because you're being a homophobic bigot. But that doesn't count, right?!
And my opinion are are illogical!
"and my opinion are are illogical!"....... and gay people are what is wrong with America?
No sin is what's wrong America nice try tho!

You're missing the point, I think. Facebook is a private business, and as such they can support any ideology they want. If you object to this ideology, then you're not being forced to use their services. That was my point all along.
If you actually want to block this, you could try unliking Facebook (if you have liked it), but I'm not sure if you can stop their own posts from showing up in your news feed.

That was what I was asking a simple question then ya'll jumped down my back! I choose what I want to see on here and I choose not to see this because I don't appove as I'm sure you wouldn't appove of the things I like. My difference of opinion doesn't mean you can be a dick to me!
